title: Check if it is a function
text: Use vertical lines to determine if it is a function. The vertical line is representing an x-value and we check that it intersects the graph in only one y-value. Then it is a function. https://openstax.org/apps/archive/20220325.143432/resources/bf1ef380302452c7e00d3413bb84a4d94a219fcb

title: Use vertical lines to determine if it is a function
text: Does every vertical line intersect the graph in only one y-value? If so, it is a function.

title: Check if it is one-to-one
text: Use horizontal lines to determine if it is a function. If every horizontal line intersects the graph of a function in at most one point, it is a one-to-one function. https://openstax.org/apps/archive/20220325.143432/resources/43477215f58d386c413c1b94fd2053a3cb23a7d3

title: Use horizontal lines to determine if it one-to-one
text: Does every horizontal line intersect the graph of a function in at most one point? If so, it is one-to-one.
